todos.title: Feedback
todos.body: Praise in public, criticize in private.

todos.title: WOWSE
todos.body: Be confident that you can carry out your plan with or without someone else.  Don't be afraid of rejection.

todos.title: Branch Out
todos.body: You will learn more from outside your own circles.

todos.title: Winners
todos.body: Whoever forms the best team to carry out the best ideas wins.

todos.title: Let It Go
todos.body: When you have done everything humanly possible then let it go.

todos.title: Call the Question
todos.body: We love to discuss more than to decide.  Sometimes you have to call the question.

todos.title: Judgment
todos.body: We cannot judge things as good or bad because we do not have all the information.  All things work together for the good of those who are called according to God's purpose.

todos.title: Equality
todos.body: Treat everyone as the child of God.

todos.title: Fragile
todos.body: Touch the fragile things.  Look out for little guy.

todos.title: Purpose
todos.body: The world is yours to do good in.

todos.title: Never Fail
todos.body: Take your hits and keep going.

todos.title: Empower Women
todos.body: Surround yourself with women.

todos.title: People
todos.body: Remember your end product is the people you create to carry on your mission.

todos.title: Pray for Others
todos.body: Pray for your team, clients, competition, and self.

todos.title: Bigger than Yourself
todos.body: People will follow things that are bigger than themselves when they understand the importance of their individual contribution.

todos.title: Set Example
todos.body: People learn from what they see, not what they hear.

todos.title: Benefits
todos.body: People are willing to give up something if they can attain something else of greater perceived value.

todos.title: To the End
todos.body: Never slam a door or burn a bridge.

todos.title: Resources
todos.body: Money is the least important.  Remember that every person you meet could introduce you to 250 more people.

todos.title: Message
todos.body: Many times unfortunate events are a message to us.

todos.title: Healthy Ways to Express Oneself
todos.body: Make sure to invest in healthy ways for people to express themselves in life or they will stray towards false idols and addictions.

todos.title: Bold
todos.body: Make statements.

todos.title: Love
todos.body: Love all.  Nobody wins until we all do.

todos.title: Blocks
todos.body: Life gives us everything we need.  We just need to take the blocks and re-arrange them.

todos.title: Rise Above
todos.body: Leaders must be able to rise above controversies, jealousies, personal attacks, and ego slights.

todos.title: Feeling Chart
todos.body: Know your emotions.

todos.title: Boss
todos.body: Know who your boss is and keep in contact with them daily.  Stay in touch with people you serve.  Draw a picture of your food chain.

todos.title: Be Visible
todos.body: Jesus was not a low-profile person.

todos.title: Train Replacements
todos.body: Jesus spent two thirds of his time teaching and educating his disciples.

todos.title: Mission
todos.body: Jesus knew that his mission was to teach people the love of God.  He did not heal everyone or raise everyone from the dead.  He stuck to his mission.

todos.title: Transparency
todos.body: Jesus had no hidden agenda.

todos.title: Fear
todos.body: Jesus faced his fears.

todos.title: Enroll
todos.body: Its easy to make the sales presentation, its tough to ask for the order.  Make sure to sign people up.  Be silent after you ask question.

todos.title: Commitment
todos.body: It is better to be hot as fire or cold as ice, because if you are lukewarm I will spit you out.

todos.title: Seeds v. Bouquet
todos.body: Invest in the seeds, for they will create a better future for you and your children.

todos.title: Fire
todos.body: If you have not been tested by fire you do not know who you are.

todos.title: Go Big
todos.body: I bargained with life for a penny, only to learn, dismayed, that any wage I would have asked of life, life would have paid.

todos.title: Expect More
todos.body: Hold people to higher standards.

todos.title: Sprinkler Phenomenon of Management
todos.body: Grass is brown closest to sprinkler head.  Avoid this by managing from the inside out.

todos.title: Dance
todos.body: God loves to dance.

todos.title: Believe in Staff
todos.body: Give them your faith but always verify.  Spend time with them.

todos.title: Celebrate
todos.body: Find reasons and be always be prepared with ways to celebrate.

todos.title: Focus
todos.body: Don't get distracted.

todos.title: Difficult Things
todos.body: Do what is necessary, not what is safe and easy.  The tendency of the masses is towards mediocrity (Huxley).

todos.title: Anchors
todos.body: Do not seek approval of others but seek approval from God.

todos.title: Energy Leaks
todos.body: Distractions.  Do not waste time or energy on meaningless battles.

todos.title: Defend
todos.body: Customers and staff are always right, leadership should take responsibility for errors.

todos.title: Foolish
todos.body: Be willing to look foolish.

todos.title: Simplicity
todos.body: Be bright, be brief ant be gone.

todos.title: Confidence
todos.body: Always think and speak positively about yourself.   Never arrogant or cocky.

todos.title: Forgiveness
todos.body: Allowing others to make mistakes while you and they keep moving forward.  Does not mean being a doormat.

todos.title: Plan
todos.body: A good idea is worth one dollar, the plan to implement the idea is worth a million dollars.  Plan your work and work your plan.  Most of the time the plan just involves showing up.
